DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate impact financial support improve management prenatal care pregnant woman low income . The judgment criterion clinically pertinent : complication pregnancy . This study also aim evaluate attitude approach qualitative survey . It plan include 4000 woman distribute two arm 2000 . One group receive financial support ( prepaid payment card credit consultation attend accord schedule follow-up recommend Haute Autorité de Santé ) ; group . The management pregnancy group modify .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman Age > 18 year 1st consultation 26th week amenorrhea Recipient free health care ( Couverture Maladie Universelle , Couverture Maladie UniverselleComplémentaire ) Who provide write informed consent take part study Persons without national health insurance cover Persons unable understand information study , despite help translator person trust necessary Persons guardianship
